mentionedBy.name: Domo Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Major BI platform known for its associative data model allowing exploratory data analysis. QlikView was the established product while Qlik Sense (launched 2014) was the newer cloud-focused offering.

2015.note: Major BI platform known for its associative data model allowing exploratory data analysis. QlikView was the established product while Qlik Sense (launched 2014) was the newer cloud-focused offering.
